Header: English Course Conducted to  Other Rankers
Content: On the directions of the Commander, Security Forces - Kilinochchi (SF-KLN),  and under the supervision General Officer Commanding (GOC) 57 Division Major General Vijitha Ravipriya an elementary  English course for other rankers got underway  during 22 October-05 November  at  Thondaman Nagar Camp. 24 Other Rankers  from different units attended the course. The course was conducted by   2 Lieutenant A.M.N Amarasingha of  9  Vijayabahu Infantry Regiment (VIR).
